skillTree.localised_description: Being bigger than the average stormvermin, Ska had to take many scavenged plates of Gromril armor to fit his enormous size.
"Mighty Queek says he not want-need stupid Dwarf-thing axe! Ska take for himself!"
Furtive, scheming, sly, cunning, underhand, devious, conniving, double-dealing, and sneaky - valuable traits if you wish to stay alive!
All Skaven are unprincipled and untrustworthy by their foul natures. However, this is rarely a disadvantage in the face of the enemy.
All the hate, envy, and malice uttered in prayer each day, returned a thousand-fold.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: "No flee-scurry! Kill-Slay!

effects.description:
Melee defense: +4 for Skavenslaves, Clan Rats, and Stormvermin units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Ska not scared! Ska the mightiest! Except Warlord Queek.
Ska Bloodtail's mere presence encourages his allies to fight harder and kill-kill!

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +5% for Skavenslaves, Clan Rats, and Stormvermin units
	(Hero's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Skavenslaves, Clan Rats, and Stormvermin units
	(Hero's army)

Weapon strength: +6% for Skavenslaves, Clan Rats, and Stormvermin units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Queek needs Ska now!

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

skillTree.localised_description: Queek demands his loyal servant to fight harder, and clear path so mighty Queek can take his prize!
Ska Bloodtail works up a frenzy to all around him. Victory is near!

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

A Rampaging unit is uncontrollable and will attack the nearest enemy unit.
	When there are no enemy units nearby, a Rampaging unit will move around randomly instead.

skillTree.localised_description: Whether by attachment or mutation, something nasty and spiky on your tail has got to bring no little advantage in battle.
"Don't look into their eyes, there is only death there!"
Always on the lookout for an opening or advantage in battle - somewhere to put the knife in…
What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.
Such is this one's conviction that others have no choice but to believe.
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
This one fights with a fervour to be both admired and despised.
This one will not go down easily - it will be necessary to break both the will and the body first.
Speaking words of power or faith can alter perceptions on the battlefield.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 20%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 30%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

items.colour_text: "Mighty Queek says he not want-need stupid Dwarf-thing axe! Ska take for himself!"
Being bigger than the average stormvermin, Ska had to take many scavenged plates of Gromril armor to fit his enormous size.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Ska Bloodtail is Warlord Queek's only trusted Lieutenant.

effects.description:
Enemy leadership: -4
	(enemy armies in local province)
